'Giant' is a musical based on the 1952 Edna Ferber novel of the same name, with
music and lyrics by Michael John LaChiusa and the book by Sybille Pearson. The
musical premiered at the Signature Theatre in Arlington, Virginia in 2009. The
story follows a ranch family in Texas over 30 years, and the effect of the oil
boom. The musical premiered Off-Broadway in 2012.
